articles.author: Jack Ewing, Melissa Eddy
articles.title: Merkel Leaves the German Economy With Trouble Under the Hood - The New York Times
articles.description: Chancellor Angela Merkel steered Europe through crises, and Germany has boomed during her tenure. But she has ducked changes needed to ensure the success lasts, analysts say.
articles.content: Ms. Merkels supporters say that she has helped the German economy dodge some bullets. Her sharp political instincts proved valuable during a eurozone debt crisis that began in 2010 and nearly destroy… [+2309 chars]

articles.title: Italy approves toughest vaccine mandate for all workers - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The measures are the first by a major European economy requiring proof of immunity for all categories of workers.
